Very Low.description: Maximum FPS for very weak systems. Fast graphics, minimal effects. No shaders available.

Low.description: Good performance for integrated graphics. Balanced settings. No shaders available.

Medium.description: Adds 3D skin layers, falling leaves, ambient sounds. Shaders optional (Complementary Reimagined).

High.description: Best balance of visuals and performance. Shaders optional (Complementary Reimagined).

Very High.description: Adds Distant Horizons for 256+ chunk view distance. Shaders optional (Complementary Reimagined).

Ultra.description: Maximum graphics: physics mod, sound physics, particles, blur effects. Shaders optional (Complementary Unbound).
